questions.question: How do I choose the right chastity cage size for me?
questions.answer:
Choosing the right chastity cage size is crucial for comfort and security. 
Follow these steps: 

1. Measure the Back Ring's circumference and calculate the diameter. 
2. Choose from circular, curved/oval, or curved hinged rings. 
3. Measure the Cage Length (flaccid) and subtract 1/4 to 1/2 inch for fit. 
4. Measure the Cage Internal Diameter by wrapping a string around and dividing by Pi (3.14). 
5. Consider the Gap between cage and ring based on body characteristics. 

For more info, visit [House of Denial](https://www.houseofdenial.com/pages/how-to-measure-your-chastity-cage-and-ring-size).
